com.keyboardr.glassremote.common.receiver

Interface MessageReceiver<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of messages to be generated from the InputStream
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StringMessageReader

    public interface MessageReceiver<R>
    Reads messages of type R from an InputStream.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MessageReceiver.OnReceiveMessageListener<M>
      Callback interface to call when messages have been read from the InputStream and parsed into M

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean read(MessageReceiver.OnReceiveMessageListener<? super R> listener)
      Reads messages from the InputStream.
      void setInputStream(InputStream input)
      Sets the InputStream this MessageReceiver will read from.

    • Method Detail

      • setInputStream

        void setInputStream(InputStream input)
        Sets the InputStream this MessageReceiver will read from.
        Parameters:
        input - the InputStream to read from

      • read

        boolean read(MessageReceiver.OnReceiveMessageListener<? super R> listener)
        Reads messages from the InputStream. Any number of messages may be read on each call so long as MessageReceiver.OnReceiveMessageListener.onReceiveMessage(Object) is called for each message. For simplicity it may be easiest for implementations to read one message per call. If no data is immediately available on the InputStream , this method blocks until data becomes available or the InputStream is closed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback to send messages to
        Returns:
        true if the InputStream can still be read from, false if it is closed or otherwise unreadable
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if setInputStream(InputStream) has not been called or was called with null input.
